title: Server Status
body:
The server status site isnt working properly.
Its currently saying euw is working but i couldnt reconnect to a running game and after that i couldnt even create a game (and my friends cant play either)

replies.body:
The service status will mainly communicate issues with *our servers*. If there are issues along your route to the server with your ISP or along the backbone network your ISP partners with, it's unlikely you'll see a message up about that. 

I'd like you to run a quick trace to our server using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). After booting up the app, simply plug in **185.40.65.1** into the hostname/focus area, then start the trace. After it's run for 5 minutes or longer, export the results as text and paste them here. We can take an in-depth look at your route to the server this way.

Let me know if you have any issues with this.
same for me and a friend. We cant log in at all.. EU West also
